exercises.exampleSolution:
multiply () {
local mul=1
arr=("$@")
for i in "${arr[@]}"; do
((mul *= i))
done
echo "$mul"

exercises.exampleSolution:
isPalindrome() {
rev=$(echo $1 | rev)
if [ $1 == $rev ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
